name: AP_CLM_IF_MOE_PX_CCI1_LN
description: The line number of the column 1 CCI edit of procedures received by prospective payment systems (PPS) pricers that use the Medicaid Outpatient Editor (MOE). This table extracts the related multiple response item CLM-22323

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MOE_COL_1_CCI_LN
columns.description: If a CCI edit has been returned for this procedure code, this field will contain the line number for the Column 1 procedure code for that CCI edit.
